data.lyric:
[ti:Shy Away]
[ar:Twenty One Pilots]
[al:Shy Away]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.29]Shy Away - Twenty One Pilots
[00:09.71]When I get home
[00:12.51]You better not be there
[00:14.13]We're placin' bets you won't
[00:17.64]Shed your modesty
[00:20.87]And the only thing to leave behind
[00:24.08]Is your own skin on the floor
[00:28.77]Don't you shy away
[00:31.44]Ah-ah-ah
[00:32.49]Manifest a ceiling
[00:34.32]When you shy away
[00:36.39]Ah-ah-ah
[00:37.36]Searchin' for that feelin'
[00:39.24]Just like an "I love you"
[00:41.47]Ooh ooh
[00:42.37]That isn't words
[00:43.84]Ooh ooh
[00:44.50]Like a song he wrote that's never heard
[00:47.19]Ah-ah-ah
[00:48.63]Don't you
[00:49.87]Ssh
[00:59.45]When you get home
[01:02.21]You barely recognize the pictures
[01:04.58]They put in a frame
[01:06.96]'Cause you shed your modesty
[01:10.35]Don't circle the track
[01:13.39]Take what you have
[01:14.88]And leave your skin on the floor
[01:18.40]Don't you shy away
[01:20.75]Ah-ah-ah
[01:21.95]Manifest a ceiling
[01:23.80]When you shy away
[01:25.85]Ah-ah-ah
[01:26.90]Searchin' for that feelin'
[01:28.67]Just like an "I love you"
[01:30.83]Ooh ooh
[01:31.90]That isn't words
[01:33.30]Ooh ooh
[01:34.19]Like a song he wrote
[01:35.57]Ah-ah-ah
[01:36.42]That's never heard
[01:39.00]When I get home
[01:41.91]Boy you better not be there
[01:43.89]You're long gone
[01:46.70]You shed your modesty
[01:49.97]Don't circle the track
[01:52.19]Just break the cycle in half
[01:54.61]And leave your skin on the floor
[02:00.47]Don't you shy away
[02:03.07]Ah-ah-ah
[02:04.10]Manifest a ceiling
